name: Dumball Rush
description:
Welcome to the crazy world of Dumball Rush!

Get ready to hit the icy slopes in this online multiplayer party game with your friends (and even your enemies, if they dare).
Join a crazy competition of 2 to 8 players, where your Dumballs, live snowballs with hilarious faces and wacky voices, are ready to fight!



Take control of your Dumball and roll towards victory by avoiding obstacles and activating powers that will upset the race. It’s snow madness, and no one is immune to the craziest twists and turns!


Discover thousands of completely crazy combinations by customizing your Dumball.

For this you can change:
  • Its color
  • Its eyes
  • Its mouth
  • And even its voice!

Make your friends jealous with the unique look of your Dumball and make sure she is the star of the tracks.





Dive into frantic races, explore the Balltown Village for wild snow football matches, or get into completely frosty ice sumo fights!

So, ready to hit the slopes with your friends and live Dumball's adventures? Join us in the shattered universe of Dumball Rush and we’ll be on the starting line!
